alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 11:47AM PST until December 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Inyo County. This includes Westgard Pass. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery or snow packed road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
